message: Hello Bob, I hope you're doing well. I have an exceptional item available and Iâ€™m offering it at $2000000. I believe this product represents a unique opportunity and would be a great fit for your needs. I look forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, $2000000 is significantly above my budget and the product's value to me. The maximum I'm willing to pay is $500000, which I believe is fair considering the market conditions. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
